custom.help: Check the class to assure a constructor exists.
custom.cause: Misspelling is most common cause. It should be "constructor".

Missing Configuration Error.name: Missing Configuration Error
Missing Configuration Error.message: A configuration attribute was expected but not supplied.

custom.help: Check to assure the configuration item exists and is loaded.
custom.cause: Mislabeling a configuration item is the most common cause.
